name: Chiquito: Pecador de la Pradera
overview: Translated as Chiquito: Sinner of the Prairie, it is a tribute to the figure of Don Gregorio Esteban Sánchez Fernández, from Malaga, known by all as Chiquito de la Calzada. Beyond the endearing character of the tribute we find a hilarious game, very playable, addictive like few others and packed with representative elements of such an important figure of humor in Spain.
